sentences.en: Chevron , the country's second biggest , added 87 cents to $ 90.17.
sentences.cn: 该国的第二大石油公司雪佛龙股价则上涨了87美分至90.17美元.

sentences.en: Chevron President heeled slippers and carrying a pattern designs, the overall appearance, is generous.
sentences.cn: 帮忙翻译一下:人字形女士高根拖鞋,鞋底有花纹设计, 整体美观, 大方.
雪佛龙也走势下行, 跌幅为1.5%.

sentences.en: Chevron, which halted onshore operations in the region last month, said it was investigating.
sentences.cn: 已于上月中止在三角洲地区石油开采业务的雪佛龙表示此事正在调查之中.

sentences.en: Dow Jones Index Boeing and energy giant Chevron warning issued financial pressure to make Dow.
sentences.cn: 道琼斯指数成份股波音和能源巨头雪佛龙发布财报预警令道指承压.

sentences.en: Energy plate fell 5.4 percent, ExxonMobil, Chevron and ConocoPhillips have been sold.
sentences.cn: 能源板块下跌了5.4%, 埃克森美孚 、 雪佛龙与康菲均遭抛售.

sentences.en: Figure patterns: chevron, round - pit, diamond, protuberant chevron, etc.
sentences.cn: 花纹图案型式: 人字型 、 圆坑型 、 菱型 、 凸人字型等.

sentences.en: First, they have used considerable imagination in defining what Chevron calls the " precise question at issue. "
sentences.cn: 首先, 法院运用了相当的想象来界定“切弗伦”案所称的 “ 有争议的确切问题 ”.

sentences.en: It isn't necessarily a bet against Chevron or even for Exxon.
sentences.cn: 并不一定要赌雪佛龙会跌或埃克森会涨.

sentences.en: Pairs traders, believing the market has overreacted to the deal, are buying Exxon and selling Chevron.
sentences.cn: 配对交易者认为市场对埃克森的交易反应过度, 因此买入埃克森并卖出雪佛龙.

sentences.en: Shell, Exxon, Chevron and others are joining in.
sentences.cn: 壳牌 、 埃克森 、 雪佛龙等其他公司也纷纷加入.

sentences.en: The chevron or arrow road sign indicates a sharp bend to the left or right.
sentences.cn: V形或箭头路标表示有向左或向右的急转弯。

sentences.en: The extra chevron must add a new distance calculation to the existing points.
sentences.cn: 现在多出的那个符号点,肯定是表示和现有坐标的距离.

sentences.en: The two men are leading a major legal case against the Chevron oil company.
sentences.cn: 他们正与雪佛龙石油公司打一场官司.

sentences.en: Today's oil giants Exxon and Chevron are the descendants of the company.
sentences.cn: 当今的石油巨头埃克森公司和雪弗龙公司均是其后裔.

trans.tran_cn: 臂章（军人佩戴以示军衔和军兵种的），[纹章学]人字形图记，波浪饰
trans.tran_en: a piece of cloth in the shape of a V which soldiers have on their sleeve to show their rank
